casebody.data:
COOPER
v.
BERGER, et al. 409PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 31, 2018 Mr. Noah H. Huffstetler, III, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Berger, Philip E., et al Mr. Jim W. Phillips, Jr., Greensboro, Attorney at Law, for Cooper, Roy A. (III) Mr. Eric M. David, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Cooper, Roy A. (III) Mr. Daniel F.E. Smith, Greensboro, Attorney at Law, for Cooper, Roy A. (III) Mr. D. Martin Warf, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Berger, Philip E., et al Ms. Candace S. Friel, Winston-Salem, Attorney at Law, for Berger, Philip E., et al Mr. Grayson Kelley, Raleigh, Chief Deputy, for Cooper, Roy A. (III)

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 30th of May 2018 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st of May 2018."

*628Defendants shall have up to and including the 5th day of July 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
